Package sailpoint.workflow

Class PolicyViolationLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.workflow.ApprovalLibrary
      • sailpoint.workflow.PolicyViolationLibrary
  • public class PolicyViolationLibrary
extends ApprovalLibrary
    A workflow library with methods related to policy violation workflows.

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public java.lang.Object delete​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                        throws GeneralException
        Delete an object associated with this workflow.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • ignore

        public java.lang.Object ignore​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                        throws GeneralException
        End the workflow associated with an object without actually doing anything to it. This is an alternative to commit() which will remove the WorkflowCase reference but won't save the changes to the approvalObject in the workflow.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • mitigateViolation

        public java.lang.Object mitigateViolation​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                   throws GeneralException
        Mitigate a policy violation. An expiration date argument is required.
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        This always returns null.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getRemediatables

        public java.lang.Object getRemediatables​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                  throws GeneralException
        Given a policy violation assumed to be for an SOD policy, return a list of the conflicting entitlements that may be remediated.
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        List of Strings representing entitlements
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • remediateViolation

        public java.lang.Object remediateViolation​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                    throws GeneralException
        Remediate a policy violation. NOTE: For role SOD policies, you must have prompted for roles to remediate and passed the result in ARG_SELECTIONS. This will be normally one or more items returned by the getRemediatables(sailpoint.workflow.WorkflowContext) method.
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        This always returns null
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getMessage

        public static java.lang.String getMessage​(java.lang.String key,
                                          java.lang.Object arg)
        Localize a message.

      • getStringList

        protected static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStringList​(java.lang.Object value)
        Coerce the given value into a list of strings. The value of the selections argument can be one of: - String - List Further, each String can be a CSV.
